title: Crisis Registry & Auto‑Sunset — Emergency Powers Audit
summary: Central registry for extraordinary directives with default auto‑sunset, periodic re‑justification prompts, and citizen/legislative diff logs.
rationale: Emergency tools are necessary but sticky; auto‑renewal demands evidence, keeping powers proportional, time‑bound, and reviewable.
impact: Prevents 'temporary' authorities from becoming permanent; improves cross‑branch oversight and public legitimacy.
